application.doc: Update the settings for a trace component

param.name: id
param.doc: Name of the instance to act on, which is a unique name that identifies the instance

param.name: trace_id
param.doc: The name of the trace component

method.name: PUT
method.doc: This web service will update the settings for a specified trace component and authorization server instance using the supplied parameters.

param.name: Accept:application/json
param.doc: Required for requests to the service

param.name: level
param.doc: The new trace level for this trace component. Valid values are integers 0 - 9 where 0 indicates that tracing is not enabled for the component.

param.name: flush_interval
param.doc: The number of seconds between the flushing of cached records to the log file. This parameter is optional. If not specified a default flush interval will be used.

param.name: rollover_size
param.doc: The maximum file size (in bytes) before this file is rolled-over. This parameter is optional. If not specified a default rollover size will be used.

param.name: max_rollover_files
param.doc: The maximum number of rollover files to be kept on disk. This parameter is optional. If not specified, all rollover files will be kept.

param.name: compress
param.doc: Whether the rollover files should be compressed. This parameter is optional. If not specified the rollover files will not be compressed.

response.doc: There is a problem with the request. The JSON message describes the problem.
File not Found, The requested service does not exist. The JSON message indicates which resource.
An internal error occurred. The JSON message indicates the problem.
